CustomField.formula: (TEXT( $User.Showroom__c ) != TEXT( Localisation__c )) && (ISPICKVAL( Etat_vehicule__c,"Réservé") || ISPICKVAL( Etat_vehicule__c,"Facturé")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( $User.Showroom__c,"Ryad Auto Rabat - Groupe Smeia")) && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Localisation__c,"Ryad Auto Rabat - Groupe Smeia")) && (ISPICKVAL(Statut_preparation__c,"Transféré") || ISPICKVAL( Statut_preparation__c,"Préparation rejetée"))
CustomField.label: Is preparation visible
